casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Isaac H. REYNOLDS. No. 588P03-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 25, 2007. Kathleen U. Baldwin, Assistant Attorney General, Garry W. Frank, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd day of October 2006 by Defendant for "Petition for Discretionary Review":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 25th day of January 2007."

Justices TIMMONS-GOODSON and HUDSON recused.
